Commentary: Mohammad Amir to Tamim Iqbal, no run
Mohammad Amir to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Hafeez, no run
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Hafeez, FOUR
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Hafeez, no run
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run
Imad Wasim to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, in the blockhole on middle stump, squeezed out into the point region
Imad Wasim to Mohammad Hafeez, FOUR, tossed up a bit more and Hafeez comes down the track. Doesn't get close to the ball, which Imad floats up wider, but he reaches out to put it away through point
Imad Wasim to Mohammad Hafeez, FOUR, down the track again and this time the line is straighter. Hafeez simply clears his front leg and lofts cleanly over the non-striker's head
Imad Wasim to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, shortish outside off, chopped to backward point
Imad Wasim to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, flighted on off stump, blocked back to the bowler

Imad Wasim to Mohammad Hafeez, FOUR, tossed up again and Hafeez is ready for it this time, gets down on one knee, gets his front pad out of the way, and sweeps powerfully to the square leg boundary. What a fluent start from him
Mohammad Amir to Tamim Iqbal, no run, length ball on off stump, blocked towards midwicket
Mohammad Amir to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, fullish slower ball on middle and off, gets his front foot across and clips towards backward square leg
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, length ball close to off stump, defended with soft hands and the ball rolls gently towards the keeper
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Hafeez, FOUR, a touch short outside off and Hafeez pounces. He's in a great position, stable, slightly open at the hips, and he just swivels through to pull over midwicket
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, length ball outside off, dabbed to third man
Mohammad Amir to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, length ball on middle stump, clipped away towards deep square leg
Sohail Tanvir to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR, full, a bit of width, and Tamim leans into a crisp drive that races away to the right of cover
Sohail Tanvir to Tamim Iqbal, no run, down the track and Tanvir shortens his length. Makes a bit of room and flat-bats hard but can't beat point
Sohail Tanvir to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, back of a length on off stump, lets it come on for a controlled short-arm pull to deep square leg
Sohail Tanvir to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, back of a length outside off, dabbed to the left of backward point

Sohail Tanvir to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, short ball, sits up on an off-stump line and he pulls firmly but close enough to the deep square leg fielder, Shakib, to reach out and stop it with his left hand
Sohail Tanvir to Tamim Iqbal, no run, length ball outside off, pushed gently into the covers, and the bowler runs across to cut off the possibility of a single
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, down the track and he bowls it flat and quick, aiming at the pads. Can't connect with the flick and it hits him on the pad, outside leg stump
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, again the round-arm angle cramps Hafeez after he comes down the track, can only play a defensive push into the covers

Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Hafeez, SIX, this time he steps inside the line perfectly while stepping out, and Shakib bowls it a little slower. Gets enough swinging room to launch that straight back over the bowler
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, down the track again, makes room for a push into the cover point region
Shakib Al Hasan to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, down the track and he fires it across the left-hander, who has to stretch out to poke into the off side
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Hafeez, FOUR, down the track, and again Hafeez steps nimbly inside the line, this time launches it smoothly over extra cover
Sohail Tanvir to Tamim Iqbal, no run, shortish, and it stops on Tamim as he looks to pull. Through his shot too early and the ball hits him on the stomach
Sohail Tanvir to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, slower ball, fairly full and close to off stump. Presses forward for a push into the cover point region
Sohail Tanvir to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, back of a length on off stump, clipped neatly to the right of mid-on
Sohail Tanvir to Tamim Iqbal, no run, makes himself room against the length ball on off stump, slaps it hard but can't get it past backward point
Sohail Tanvir to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, full outside off, jabbed away towards third man
Sohail Tanvir to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, just a touch short and Hafeez plays a crunching pull from an off-stump line. There's a man back at deep midwicket, though
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, down the track and Shakib loops it up full, next to Hafeez's feet. No hitting room and he jabs it back to the left of the bowler
Shakib Al Hasan to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs, full, turning down leg, Tamim clips it away towards fine leg
Shakib Al Hasan to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR, down the track and Shakib serves up a full-toss, leg-stumpish. Tamim just swats it away to the square leg boundary
Shakib Al Hasan to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, sees him coming and fires it wider. Reaches out to push to sweeper cover
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Hafeez, SIX, full-toss, and Hafeez clears his front leg and makes swinging room to launch that over extra cover
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, sees him stepping out again and bowls it very slow, at the pads. Through the sweep too quick and it hits him on the body
Usama Mir to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, quickish on middle stump. Shuffles across to tuck into the square leg region

Usama Mir to Mohammad Hafeez, FOUR, short and wide, and he simply reaches out and meets it with a cleverly angled bat face to send it racing into the gap between backward point and short third man. Poor delivery

Usama Mir to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, full and wide this time and Hafeez reaches out to drive, ends up spooning it in the air to the right of short third man off the outside half of his bat. Simmons moves quickly and dives to his right but the ball drops just wide of him
Usama Mir to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, full on middle stump, Tamim lap-sweeps towards Simmons, who fumbles the pick-up at short fine leg, allowing them to run an easy single
Usama Mir to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, tossed up outside off, driven to sweeper cover
Usama Mir to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, down the track to the off-stump ball, hits with the turn, on the bounce to long-on
Bopara to Tamim Iqbal, no run, back of a length slower ball outside off, swiped towards mid-on
Bopara to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, down the track now, gets inside the line of this length ball outside off, flat-bats towards sweeper cover
Bopara to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, short on off stump, pulled to deep midwicket
Bopara to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, short ball, sits up on off stump, pulled to deep square leg to bring up his half-century. He's looking in such fluent form here
Bopara to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, short, angling into the batsman, pulled to deep square leg
Bopara to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, slower ball wide of off, dabbed away to the right of short third man, who makes a full-length sprawling save
Usama Mir to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, back of a length outside off, dabbed to short third man
Usama Mir to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, full on middle and leg, gets his front pad out of the way to drive inside-out to sweeper cover
Usama Mir to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, down the track and Usama fires a quicker ball across Tamim, who lets it come on and steers to the right of sweeper cover
Usama Mir to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, back of a length on middle and leg, makes room to dab backward of point
Usama Mir to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR, shortish, too much width, Tamim frees his arms and slaps it away to the backward point boundary
Usama Mir to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, down the track and he bowls it quicker and shorter. Swiped away to deep square leg, didn't quite middle the pull
Bopara to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, shortish on off stump, Tamim makes a lot of room to flay it away towards sweeper cover

Bopara to Mohammad Hafeez, SIX, loopy full-toss outside off, misdirected slower ball, and Hafeez sets himself up nicely, clears his front leg, and just clouts it over the midwicket boundary. The ball seems to be stuck to the edge of the roof! They're bringing out a box of replacements now

Bopara to Mohammad Hafeez, OUT, slower ball, and Hafeez is too early into his sweep. The ball grips, turns in, and hits his back leg and Bopara's appeal is immediately upheld. To me, that seemed to be missing leg stump. Hawkeye agrees
Bopara to Kamran Akmal, no run, back of a length on middle stump, makes room and dabs to backward point
Bopara to Kamran Akmal, FOUR, short and wide and that's punished. Kamran loves width, just stands there and cuts it away to the left of the diving backward point fielder
Bopara to Kamran Akmal, 2 runs, length ball on off stump, gets his front pad across and works it towards deep midwicket
Usama Mir to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, tossed up, turning down leg, lap-swept towards short fine leg
Usama Mir to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, quickish on the pads, tucked away to short fine leg
Usama Mir to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs
Usama Mir to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs, down the track and Usama offers a bit of width with this flighted ball. Throws his hands at it and slices it in the air, bounces down towards the deep point boundary
Usama Mir to Tamim Iqbal, no run, down the track and he bowls it quicker outside off. Can't get under the big hit and he drags it along the ground, back to the bowler
Usama Mir to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, back of a length on off stump, goes on the back foot and pushes through midwicket with a straight bat
Bopara to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, length ball outside off, pushed into the covers

Bopara to Kamran Akmal, no run, slower ball on off stump, angling in from wide of the crease. Kamran looks to make room to dab into the off side, ends up pushing it back to the bowler, off the inner half of his bat
Bopara to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, wrong length to pull, and the ball sneaks under his bat and hits his pad, but is clearly angling down leg

Bopara to Tamim Iqbal, OUT, down the track to the full ball on off stump, gets inside the line to free his arms, makes decent connection with his lofted drive, but picks out the long-off fielder running to his right. The end of a slightly stodgy innings from the Bangladesh opener
Bopara to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, full slower ball outside off, driven to sweeper cover
Wicket: ['Tamim Iqbal c Simmons b Bopara 37 (35b 3x4 0x6) SR: 105.71']

Commentary: Bopara to Malan, no run, back of a length outside off, punched to the left of short cover
Usama Mir to Kamran Akmal, no run, tossed up on leg stump, driven inside-out to sweeper cover
Usama Mir to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, full on the pads, clipped to deep square leg
Usama Mir to Malan, 1 run, full outside off, driven towards deep point
Usama Mir to Kamran Akmal, no run, shortish, a bit of width, can't beat backward point with his cut

Usama Mir to Kamran Akmal, SIX, down the track, and he manages to make himself a lot of swinging room even though Usama looked to fire it into his feet. Got inside the line and achieved a full extension of his arms to launch it high over long-on
Usama Mir to Kamran Akmal, no run, good reply. A quickish legbreak close to off stump, rips past the outside edge as he looks to drive it inside-out
Bopara to Malan, 1 run, shortish outside off, slapped to sweeper cover
Bopara to Kamran Akmal, 1 leg bye, back of a length angling down leg. Kamran misses the pull and it rolls away into the backward square leg region off his thigh pad
Bopara to Malan, 1 run, fullish outside off, makes a bit of room and steers towards sweeper cover
Bopara to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, slower ball on off stump, makes room to dab it backward of point
Bopara to Malan, FOUR, too much width on this occasion and Malan cuts it away to the right of backward point
Bopara to Malan, 1 run, slower ball outside off, driven on the up into the covers
Imad Wasim to Malan, 1 run, length ball close to off stump, driven to mid-off
Imad Wasim to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, fullish outside off, makes room to go through the covers but it doesn't quite come on, and he drags the bottom-handed drive down to long-off
Imad Wasim to Malan, 1 run, swiped away to deep square leg
Imad Wasim to Kamran Akmal, SIX, drags the quicker ball down short, and Kamran punishes it, gets his front leg out of the way and gives it the old baseball club over midwicket
Imad Wasim to Kamran Akmal, 2 runs, a touch short again, pulled away to the left of deep square leg
Imad Wasim to Kamran Akmal, FOUR, down the track again and Imad lands one right in his slot, on a middle-and-leg line, to launch down the ground for a one-bounce four
Mohammad Amir to Malan, 1 run, back of a length outside off, clears his front leg and swipes to deep square leg
Mohammad Amir to Kamran Akmal, no run, ouch, a painful blow for Akmal. Not short enough to pull, and it sneaks past his bat and hits him on the inner, unprotected part of the back knee
Mohammad Amir to Kamran Akmal, OUT, low full-toss outside off and Amir has struck. Can't get any elevation on this, and Vince takes a good low catch at cover, diving to his right
Mohammad Amir to Shahid Afridi, 1 run, on the pads, clipped away through square leg
Mohammad Amir to Malan, 1 leg bye, low full-toss, cramps Malan who can't connect with the flick, and it hits him on the full, on the pad, was easily sliding down leg
Wicket: ['Kamran Akmal c Vince b Mohammad Amir 30 (20b 2x4 2x6) SR: 150.00']

Commentary: Mohammad Amir to Shahid Afridi, 1 run, a bit of width, slapped away to sweeper cover
Sohail Tanvir to Shahid Afridi, FOUR, full, angling into the pads, and Afridi puts this away easily, flicks it away to the long leg boundary
Sohail Tanvir to Malan, 1 run, full outside off, stabbed away to backward point
Sohail Tanvir to Shahid Afridi, 1 run, slower ball outside off, swiped down towards long-on

Sohail Tanvir to Malan, OUT, slower ball angling into the batsman and he looks to take on deep midwicket. Clears his front leg and gives it a big hoick. Doesn't hit it too cleanly, and Imad runs to his left to take a simple catch on the boundary
Sohail Tanvir to Shahid Afridi, 1 run, yorker close to off stump, jams his bat down in a hurry to keep it out
Sohail Tanvir to Sammy, 1 run, in the blockhole on off stump, jabbed away towards extra cover
Mohammad Amir to Sammy, no run, slower ball wide of off, sees him making room and slants it wider. Can't reach out to it and elects to leave it alone, hoping it'll be called wide. It isn't
Wicket: ['DJ Malan c Imad Wasim b Sohail Tanvir 12 (12b 1x4 0x6) SR: 100.00']

Commentary: Mohammad Amir to Sammy, SIX, shortish on middle stump, and that one's been hit into another emirate. Just got his front leg out of the way and hammered it, a flat-bat hit high over long-on
Mohammad Amir to Sammy, no run, in the blockhole on leg stump, and all he can do is dig it out back to the bowler
Mohammad Amir to Sammy, no run, wider yorker this time, Sammy can't make contact as he looks to make room and carve through point
Mohammad Amir to Sammy, 1 leg bye, looks to work it through the leg side, misses the full ball, and it ricochets off the pad towards point
Mohammad Amir to Shahid Afridi, 2 runs, Full on off stump, jabbed away to the right of sweeper cover
Sohail Tanvir to Sammy, no run, back of a length from round the stumps, goes for the hoick and misses
Sohail Tanvir to Sammy, SIX, short again, and Sammy loves these. It's angling into him from around the wicket and he opens out to club that high over wide long-on
Sohail Tanvir to Sammy, 1 run, short again, this time it stops a bit and Sammy swipes down to long-on
Sohail Tanvir to Shahid Afridi, SIX, makes a bit of room and he follows with a low full-toss. Afridi swings freely through the line and launches it high, straight back over the bowler's head
Sohail Tanvir to Shahid Afridi, 1 run, in the blockhole on middle stump and Afridi makes room to flat-bat through cover point
Sohail Tanvir to Sammy, FOUR, full-toss angling into the stumps. Sammy slogs across it and gets a bottom-edge that sneaks past leg stump and races away to the fine leg boundary
